google_play_reviews.content: very pleased with the existence of this app. works really well. good improvements from the old app. configurable settings that make you feel more secure. couldn't be better.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

google_play_reviews.content: App does exactly what I need and allows me to host my own passwords. Very responsive support with fast bug fixes!
Great Frontend for the passwordstore. I don't miss a feature and it just works. Great work!
Seamless integration with git repos, OTP barcode scanning along with all basic features. Awesome!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Glad you like it :)
Let us know via e-mail if you want any other features!

google_play_reviews.content: It's great! Every update brings new features, better look and improvements. Thank you!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'd love to hear in more detail about what parts of the app feel slower to you. Please send me an email at aps@msfjarvis.dev and I'll try to get this resolved for this month's release.

google_play_reviews.content: I just started to use gopass and I liked it and the reason that I installed this app was to sync my passwords with my other devices but in the first step when I wanted to clone my repository I got not authorized. Update: down to one star because telling someone that they "hold your application hostage" just because they have told you that even after your update (mentioned in other reviews) the app still has the exact same problem is rude and irrational and unprofessional.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The issue that was reported to us and then fixed in this particular release has been confirmed by the reporter to be resolved, so I most certainly didn't ship an untested fix. Like I mentioned many times, all I ask of users is to send me an e-mai that let's me actually understand and fix their issue. If that's too much work then I owe you nothing.

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome tool. There's one thing going on that I realized today though. When trying to synchronize, (push/pull or viceversa) it fails with "not authorized" before asking for a password. I also tried other methods of authentication (ssh key and gpg key) with no success. I had used it before with no issues. I hope it can be fixed. I'll be happy to provide more info if it's necessary.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We have pushed a v1.11.2 version that addresses this bug, if you're still unable to make the app work then please email me at aps@msfjarvis.dev and I'd be more than happy to sort it out.

google_play_reviews.content: This has LONG been the best password manager on Android, particularly for those of us who üíò the FOSS ecosystem, üíò standards-based software that interoperates very well with other stalwarts, and üíòmanaging our own privacy very tightly. Compatibility with GnuPG, pass, and Git are excellent features! The new developer is bringing this software into the future and he's proven very responsive to feedback as he does so. There are easier password managers, but if you take the time, this is the best.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks a lot for your kind words, we appreciate it deeply.

google_play_reviews.content: Very good practical, easy to sync with pass.
The app now works with great integration with Pass as it has in the past, except this time with greater auto fill functionality added.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Version 1.8.1 has been pushed an hour ago to resolve this problem. If Play Store is too slow with the update, you can grab the APK from the latest release on GitHub.

google_play_reviews.content: Does exactly what I want. Syncs with server, has biometric, and autofill. 5 stars
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! If you ever want more don't hesitate in creating an issue on GitHub or sending an email :)

google_play_reviews.content: Perfect with proper face id verification. Highly recommended. Well done!
The latest version is awesome! Auto completion works with any site tried so far and searching is much much faster!
Works really well, especially now that it has implemented Android's modern auto fill system.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Glad to hear that! Please feel free to reach over email if you have any requests or suggestions

google_play_reviews.content: So much better than the legacy version
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Happy to be an improvement, means we're doing things right :) Let us know over email or GitHub if there's anything else that you'd like to see in the app.

google_play_reviews.content: So goddamn good. Please add this version to F-Droid. They added the ability to build this version within the last two months.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! Unfortunately F-Droid inclusion is still in progress but we're working on it

google_play_reviews.content: Thanks for the recent update to save passphrases!
